subject: Re: Reminder: Your discount code at SIMSONN
description_text:
Ill wait until you release a wheelbase ....do ypu know when

conversations.body_text: Hi The Lord,  Our wheelbase is still under development and will require some more time before it’s ready.

Yes i know its in developtment, maybee there is a chance for a release in 2025...?
Am 12. Sept. 2025, 14:39 +0200 schrieb service@simsonn.com
Hi The Lord,  Yes, we are planning to launch it in 2025.
